description: Try our easy to follow Yellow Thai Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Yellow curry,Quick & easy dinner,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Rice,Sweet potato,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free
name: Yellow Thai Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 285g Street Kitchen Yellow Thai Curry (including curry paste spice pack and coconut milk)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium saucepan over high heat. Add chicken and cook, turning, until golden.
Add spice mix (lime leaves and chilli), onion and sweet potato. Stir to combine and cook for 30 seconds.
Add curry paste, coconut milk and water. Stir well, cover and reduce heat to simmer.
Cook for 20 minutes or until chicken and potato are cooked. Serve with rice, lime wedges and Thai basil.
